alert.note: Alert for Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bucks County through 730 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Quakertown, or 11 miles southeast of Allentown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Quakertown, Perkasie, Doylestown, Byram, Bedminster, Chalfont, Tinicum, Dublin, Pleasant Valley, Fricks, Ottsville, Pipersville, Springtown, Gardenville, Telford, Sellersville, New Britain, Richlandtown, Trumbauersville and Silverdale. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 42 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
